title: deltacryptos
author: deltacryptos
created_time: July 14, 2022, 02:15:24 PMLast edit: September 19, 2022, 03:36:21 PM by deltacryptos
content: New DELTAC token - DeltaCryptos ICOWe just launched the DeltaCryptos ICO (Initial coin offering). Now you can buy DELTAC token and be part of the most innovative cryptocurrency derivatives platform.DELTAC token is both a utility token and a security token of the DeltaCryptos ecosystem.FOR TRADERS:App RewardsUpgrade MembershipsFOR INVESTORS:Income from feesOwn shares and receive dividendsTokenomicsName: DeltaCryptos TokenSymbol: DELTACNetwork: ETH - ERC20Type: Utility & SecurityTotal supply: 200,000,000Price: $0.1Token AllocationWe will be issuing 200,000,000 DELTAC tokens as part of our ICO. No additional tokens will be created. 65% of the tokens will be sold in the successive phases of the crowdsale.Application DemoYou can test our application and trade futures & options for Bitcoin and 15+ cryptocurrencies with multiple expiration dates.Affiliate ProgramRefer our ICO and earn money through participating in DeltaCryptos Affiliate Program! You will receive affiliate commissions for every user that buys tokens through your link. You can build your affiliates network up to 3 levels.Airdrop and Bounty ProgramDeltaCryptos is launching an Official Airdrop and a Bounty Program to reward its supporters. Go to our website to view all the details.CommunityTwitterFacebookRedditYoutubeInstagramTelegramPublic Sale is live! Buy DELTAC tokens hereDeltaCryptos Airdrop thread

comments.author: deltacryptos
comments.body: Quote from: unnamed0simple on July 14, 2022, 03:09:42 PMDeltaCryptos Token contract address?Token has not been created yet. We are in the pre-ICO phase. You can check the development roadmap.

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: deltacryptos on July 14, 2022, 03:35:08 PMQuote from: unnamed0simple on July 14, 2022, 03:09:42 PMDeltaCryptos Token contract address?Token has not been created yet. We are in the pre-ICO phase. You can check the development roadmap.As ICO these days are finding it hard to achieve their targets, do you have private funding to pursue the developments?You will observe that very few are getting their funds via ICO because people are not trusting the ICO anymore.If you have your own funds, better continue your developments and show a working platform before your crowdsourcing.That may give a lil bit of trust to your potential investors. Otherwise, you may look for other options on how to finance your project.

comments.author: deltacryptos
comments.body: Quote from: TimeTeller on July 14, 2022, 11:40:40 PMQuote from: deltacryptos on July 14, 2022, 03:35:08 PMQuote from: unnamed0simple on July 14, 2022, 03:09:42 PMDeltaCryptos Token contract address?Token has not been created yet. We are in the pre-ICO phase. You can check the development roadmap.As ICO these days are finding it hard to achieve their targets, do you have private funding to pursue the developments?You will observe that very few are getting their funds via ICO because people are not trusting the ICO anymore.If you have your own funds, better continue your developments and show a working platform before your crowdsourcing.That may give a lil bit of trust to your potential investors. Otherwise, you may look for other options on how to finance your project.We have a working platform, you can sign up here and trade options for 15+ cryptocurrencies. So, we are not like other ICOs, that show just an idea and a whitepaper. We already developed a working demo version of our derivatives trading application.

comments.body: Deltacryptos ICO Pre Sale starts in few hours! You can sign up and be the first to buy DELTAC token here

comments.author: deltacryptos
comments.body: Sorry, there was an error on the Subject of this thread about the starting date of the Pre Sale. DeltaCryptos ICO Pre Sale is live and is going to end on August 15.

comments.author: deltacryptos
comments.body: The Pre Sale of DeltaCryptos ICO just ended!ICO will resume with the Public Sale on September 19.

comments.author: deltacryptos
comments.body: The Public sale of DeltaCryptos ICO is live! You can buy DELTAC token with 40% discount at www.deltacryptos.com/ico-homeRemember that you can get +5% DELTAC with the Affiliate program.We made some changes to our Airdrop and Bounty program. Now you can claim a free 100 DELTAC reward.

comments.author: deltacryptos
comments.body: DeltaCryptos Public Sale stage 2 beginsThe 2nd stage of DeltaCryptos Public Sale starts today. You can buy DELTAC tokens for $0.08 until November 14, that's a 20% discount! A total of 30 million DELTAC are available for the 2nd stage (15% of the total supply). The minimum purchase is 500 DELTAC.Remember that you can get free tokens using the Affiliate program, the Airdrop and the Bounty Program.

comments.author: deltacryptos
comments.body: DeltaCryptos Whitepaper is available!The DeltaCryptos Whitepaper has been published and it is available for download in our website: https://deltacryptos.com/#whitepaper. In the Whitepaper you will find detailed information about the DeltaCryptos project: market overview, project features, tokenomics, roadmap and business model.Public Sale stage 3 just started!The stage 3 of the DeltaCryptos ICO public sale is live and will end on December 12. You can buy DELTAC tokens for 0.1$. The minimum amount to purchase is 500 DELTAC. Remember that you can get +5% DELTAC with the Affiliate program.

comments.author: deltacryptos
comments.body: The ICO ends in on week!Remember that the DeltaCryptos ICO ends on December 12. You still have few days to purchase DELTAC tokens and be part of the project. You can also get free tokens with the Airdrop, the Bounty program and the Affiliate program. The different promotional programs will end also on the same day than the ICO.

comments.author: deltacryptos
comments.body: DeltaCryptos ICO final sale promotion!Less than 48 hours left until the end of the DeltaCryptos ICO! Now you can benefit form this final sale promotion:+20% extra tokens if you buy 10000 DELTAC or more.+50% extra tokens if you buy 100000 DELTAC or more.For example: if you purchase 200000 DELTAC, you will get an extra +100000 DELAC, so a total of 300000 DELTAC tokens will be credited to your wallet.

comments.author: deltacryptos

On the next days, we are going to publish the data about raised funds and the next steps of the project.Airdrop rewardsWe just reviewed and approved all the pending rewards of the airdrop and the bounty program. Sign in into your DeltaCryptos account to view the results.
